name: Rave (Revetoon, Raynorhs)
description:
General

This project was made during the Pot-au-jeu 2 Game Jam in May 2019.

Synopsis

You've heard that far from the civilization, a new dungeon has appeared. You decide to explore it, even if the road is long and very dangerous. After many adventures during which you lost your companions, you finally arrived at the foot of the tower. But your journey isn't over, you decide to discover all the mysteries hidden within the dungeon...

Tools

  • Blender
  • Unity
  • Photoshop Element

Credits

  • TextMeshPro for better font display
  • Mixamo.com for the player animations.

Issues

A known issue is affecting the enemies knockback and death animation. Fortunately, this issue is not too impacting on the gameplay.

Monsters won't spawn after level 8.

All the listed bugs will be fixed after the end of the vote phase of the jam.

Made By Revetoon & Raynorhs.
